name: Endless Trek
description:
Enjoy the beautiful scenery on your endless trek!

I've been working on creating an infinite procedural forest. This is a neat minigame where you have to find your way to the objective using a map and a compass.

The objective becomes visible when you come close enough to it

If you fall through the ground then just press R to restart

Controls:

  • M - Toggle map
  • R - Restart game
  • WASD  - Move
  • Scroll - Rotate map
  • Esc - Exit game

Follow me on Twitter for updates: https://twitter.com/LeeviTalvilehto
